attributes.action: pass legislation allowing terminally ill people to make living wills which will be adhered to when the time comes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think in this day and age, we should be allowing those who are terminally ill, to decide when and how they die. this is their right, and who are we to deny them this.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on this issue at 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Euthanasia/
It is our policy to only have one petition per issue open, so please sign the existing petition rather than setting up your own.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
